sentences.english: At the same time, banks in Western Europe are neck-deep in shaky loans to these countries.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，西欧银行的贷款也深陷新兴市场国家。

sentences.english: He also fixed a tennis elbow within no time.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时他还治愈了我的网球肘。

sentences.english: At the same time, Christians in waiting for an opportunity outside Granada.
sentences.chinese: 而与此同时，基督徒在格拉纳达以外等待时机。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Master Roshi is confronted by an old rival.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，龟仙人又遇到了他的一个老对手。

sentences.english: In the meantime, most of the kinks have been worked out.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，操作指南的大部分内容也已经做出来了。

sentences.english: At the same time, Li Shizhen Medicine Innovation Award is presented at first.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，李时珍医药创新奖也在会上首次颁发。

sentences.english: Analysis of the Non-linear Relationship between Sci-tech Progress and Social Development;
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，非政治性的势力也在发展之中。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Wolves want to sign Liverpool midfielder Jay Spearing on a season-long loan.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，狼队希望租借斯皮灵一年。

sentences.english: And in the meantime, they'd pay the banks interest on thosebonds.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，它们也用债券支付银行的利息。

sentences.english: At the same time, I knew that in the theater in our hometown I would care.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，我知道在家乡的剧院我就不能这么放肆了。

sentences.english: At the same time, short-term traders bought to reverse bets that stock prices would fall.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，短线交易员逆市买入，押注股价回升。

sentences.english: At the same time, they can receive information and knowledge about the development.
sentences.chinese: 并与此同时，获得我们对前海研讨的知识。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Sri Lanka became the centre of the earlier Theravada order of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，斯里兰卡成了佛教早期派别上座部的中心。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Seret had inched along the car toward Stephen.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，塞里特沿着汽车一点一点地靠近了史蒂芬。

sentences.english: At the same time, the conflict between the employers and workers led to the strike.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，劳资双方的冲突也引起了一场罢工。

sentences.english: In the meantime, however, the practice will continue.
sentences.chinese: 然而，与此同时，现实情况还在继续。

definition: apart from this/in addition to this
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
